author: Sue
text:
Best of Mornings to everyone.  Homemade biscuits at our house this morning!

Finally found a recipe that works every danged time! Mile high biscuits with tons of layers. https://t.co/fRIuqUBMDG

author: Sue
text: He speaks words of wisdom. https://t.co/qHszVaqBoS

author: Sue
text: This is long, but entirely worth reading if you care about a woman's choice. https://t.co/ZeqwSiAksU

author: Sue
text:
in the stomach
They had people repeatedly kick them in the stomach
Girls were forced to try anything and everything.  They were given no choice.
Many died.
Many who lived were unable to further have children.
This will happen to a girl or woman you know. 2/End

author: Sue
text:
Oklahoma, Arkansas, Kansas, and Missouri
If ya'll aren't listening to @ryanhallyall , please do so.  He's on YouTube live right now tracking the weather.   
His motto is "Don't be scared, be prepared."

author: Sue
text: Warnings going off on the tv (in the other room) for weather anything north of Dallas/Richardson Line.  Ya'll need to be aware.

author: Sue
text: Anyone else lose power for a moment in north Richardson?

author: Sue
text: North and East of Rosalia KS.  Take cover!!

author: Sue
text: Everyone around El Dorado St Park in KS take cover!

author: Sue
text:
El Dorado Kansas 
Take cover!!  Take cover!!

author: Sue
text: I've been sitting on this for a day and it's eating me alive.  I now have permission to post my Great Nieces and Nephews!!!!  They were born yesterday and are all healthy.  Baby C underwent surgery yesterday to close a hole in her lung but all are well. We are over the moon! https://t.co/5t5L2LmJKd

author: Sue
text: Moving towards Meadowcreek Farms.  East of Witchita.

author: Sue
text:
Big tornado in Kansas right now
Right over I-35 and the Turnpike right at the Kaiser Vet Service.

author: Sue
text: If you need a pick me up today, this is the thread.  The replies are so heartwarming as well. https://t.co/N1jCdw33m6

author: Sue
text:
Earlier, I saw that @BrettSula1 called MTG

Pergorie Traitor Greene

Just wanted to share that. 😉

author: Sue
text: She was Shocked, Shocked, Shocked.  BlahBlahBlah

author: Sue
text:
MTG "We were only preparing to object."

And I'm  6 foot tall Super Model.

author: Sue
text: Well, it's as expected. She's lied on almost every question.  Either that or she's evaded, or accused them of using horrible sources, or accused them of using chopped up clips, accused them of twisting her words & trying to force a narrative, etc.

author: Sue
text:
MTG
"I don't recall."
"I can't remember."
"I'm not really sure."
BlahBlahBlah

author: Sue
text: MTG is lying through her teeth.  Soooo 'innocent'.  ugh

author: Sue
text: MTG thinks she's smarter than the questioner.  She's second guessing, jumping ahead of his questions, and generally trying to cover her behind.  Trying to act all innocent.

author: Sue
text:
and laugh at the path of destruction. Please send our poor darling your best thoughts as she's hell bent on letting her parents know how entirely miserable she is right down to her soul.  LOL 
On a brighter note her folks had homemade sausage pizza tonight for supper.  Yumm  /3

author: Sue
text: I've given up trying to pick up the things she's knocked into, over, and through as it's a full time job and I end up picking up/moving/etc. about 10 times per day.  She lumbers through the house like a one woman wrecking crew and at this point I can only groan in sympathy   2/

author: Sue
text: Well, skin allergy season is upon us again and Molly has ended up in the cone of shame once more. This keeps her from messing with the itchy spots and making them worse. Although our 80 lb. darling thinks she's smaller Molly is no shrinking violet and definitely not lap sized. 1/

author: Sue
text: Thunder and light rain near Plano, tx.

author: Sue
text:
Anyone near Salado, Tx
Head to your safe spot now!!  tornado on the way pretty quick!!  Grab your phone.  Have your shoes on.  Grab the football helmet and get ot your safe spot!!

Stay safe!

author: Sue
text: Amen https://t.co/eqwTFBRjZP

author: Sue
text: Well,  I hope I'm not jinxing it but all's quiet for the time being. Our pup Molly hasn't been feeling well either so I've spent my time going between Hubs and Molly making sure everyone is breathing. LOL If it stays quiet for a bit longer I might just get some sleep tonight. 😊

author: Sue
text:
For those who sent their kind thoughts the other day. Here's an update on Hubs.
Went to Doc-In-A-Box today

It's not pneumonia (thank the Universe) it's incredibly close to it 7 cough is worse.

Loaded for Bear w/ meds. (4)

Hopefully, will respond to meds QUICKLY.
